response.overview: Steve Augeri was the vocalist of one Journey for eight years, as well as being a member of Tyketto and Tall Stories for a while, and returned to Nottingham to perform at Firefest for the second time at Firefest VIII on October 22nd 2011, having previously played at Firefest V with Tall Stories in 2008. His set mostly consisted of Journey songs.  Setlist:  "Jamie (Tyketto song)", "Separate Ways (Worlds Apart) (Journey song)", "Ask the Lonely (Journey song)", "Higher Place (Journey song)", "Lights (Journey song)", "Kiss Me Softly (Journey song) (Acoustic)", "Stone in Love (Journey song)", "Down by the Riverside", "Sister of Mercy (Tall Stories song)", "We Will Meet Again (Journey song)", "Wheel in the Sky (Journey song)", "Rich Man's World (For the Love of Money)", "Faithfully (Journey song)", "Don't Stop Believin' (Journey song)", "Lovin', Touchin', Squeezin' (Journey song)", "Any Way You Want It (Journey song)", "All the Way"
response.title: Steve Augeri: Live at Firefest 2011
